summary: A hard-nosed newspaper editor poses as a night school student in order to woo a journalism teacher who cannot stand him.
cast: Clark Gable|Doris Day|Gig Young|Mamie Van Doren|Nick Adams|Peter Baldwin|Marion Ross|Charles Lane|Jack Albertson|Florenz Ames|Harry Antrim|Vivian Nathan|Army Archerd|James Bacon|Frank Baker|Terry Becker|Paul Bradley|George Cisar|Oliver Cross|Hal K. Kemp|Paine Knickerbocher|Larry Leverett|Philo McCullough|Norton Mockridge|Margaret Muse|Norman Papson|'Snub' Pollard|Frank P. Quinn|Fred Rapport|Frank Richards|Victor Romito|Vernon Scott|Steffi Sidney|Sidney Skolsky|Merritt Smith|Hal Taggart|A.E. Ukonu
title: Enséñame a querer
